mapper.select: select sid, student_name, grade, class_number, (select major_name from sys_major where sys_major.id = sys_user_student.major_id) major_name, (select college_name from sys_college, sys_major where sys_major.id = sys_user_student.major_id and sys_college.id = sys_major.college_id) college_name from sys_user_student

SELECT USER .id, username, real_name, sid, student_name, sex, (SELECT major_name FROM sys_major WHERE sys_major.id = student.major_id) major_name, (SELECT college_name FROM sys_college, sys_major WHERE sys_major.id = student.major_id AND sys_college.id = sys_major.college_id) college_name, grade, class_number, phone, email, avatar, create_time, update_time FROM sys_user USER INNER JOIN sys_user_student student ON student.sid = USER.username WHERE sid = #{username}
